name: sistema-gestao-restaurante
description: Sistema de gestão de restaurante com múltiplos perfis de usuário

scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd server && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push

author: Victor Rony
